channel.title: [317] Smithing DC [PI]
channel.description:
Whenever I try to smith something on an anvil, I end up DCing and it gives this large code of errors. It's not what you'd normally see, it's T1 and T2 errors. I've been trying to fix this around and I occasionally get NullPointerExceptions every once in a while. Every smithing interface like this one messes up, they all just DC you. After you DC you do however make the item. Someone suggested it was something to do with RemoveAllWindows method. If you could tell me where this is located, or even give me the fix for it, I'll be extremely grateful. The interface is the normal sanity interface. This is a 317, PI client. Here's the list of errors.
You can click the button (item picture), but once that's happened you'll just DC.
[CODE]Error: T1 - 6,0 - 44,65 Error: T1 - 26,0 - 6,44 Error: T1 - 127,0 - 26,6 Error: T1 - 96,0 - 74,127 Error: T1 - 141,0 - 96,74 Error: T1 - 18,0 - 151,141 Error: T2 - 142,18,151 - 2,2130,5093 - 32,100,[/CODE]
This is the interface that messes up:
[img]http://www.imgjoe.com/x/thefycjedups.bmp[/img]
I tried to give you as much information as possible. If you need any more, just ask :)!

item.title: [317] Smithing DC [PI]
item.dc:creator: @The7thSanctum The7thSanctum
item.description:
@The7thSanctum wrote:

Don’t worry, I fixed this.

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Smithing DC [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Ambokile Ambokile
item.description:
@Ambokile wrote:

Packet 151 is the packet to create a world object. What are you creating at (5093, 2130) at height level 2?

Read full topic

item.title: [317] Smithing DC [PI]
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

those type of errors are thrown generally when there is a packet misunderstanding. Make sure your client and the server are both using the same packet id’s.

Read full topic
